reviews.review_text:
If you are a person looking for a decent Non veg Food just to fill your hunger in South Goa , this is the place. Good ambience.

Biriyani was Okie .

If you're craving delicious shawarma, chicken popcorn, chicken gravies, naan, or chicken strips, this place offers decent food, but the overall experience is far from ideal. While the dishes are flavorful, the staff's attitude leaves much to be desired. The service could definitely use some improvement in terms of friendliness and attentiveness.

On top of that, hygiene is a serious concern here. I've spotted cockroaches running across the floor during my visit, which raises major doubts about the cleanliness of the kitchen. If you're someone who values hygiene and a clean environment, this might not be the place for you.

In short, the food may satisfy your cravings, but the poor hygiene and lack of good customer service make it hard to recommend.

We had stomach upset for 2 days after eating here.
Atmosphere was very shady.
in the AC section there were rats running around.
on the door there was a cheap notice about "10rs extra per shawarma if AC seat".
